displayName.text: The Orthodontist & Co. in Upper East Side

formattedAddress: at the Line Dental, 510 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: at the Line Dental, 510 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: After months searching for an orthodontist, I had finally scheduled my first consultation with Dr. Juson and Melody, and I knew right away that this is where I want to get my complex treatment. Dr. Juson's dedication to my well-being extended beyond the clinical aspects, creating a sense of trust and comfort. The genuine care exhibited throughout each appointment made the five-year treatment feel like a collaborative journey rather than a routine procedure making me feel valued and understood. The consistent high level of professionalism, also the compassionate approach, defines Dr. Juson as not just a healthcare provider but a partner in my overall health. His team is so amazing, always smiling and welcoming. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone seeking not only exceptional orthodontic care but also a supportive and empathetic healthcare experience.

originalText.text: I’d give more than 5 stars if possible! So pleased with my treatment with Dr. Juson. I had braces in preparation for my wedding last year and the result was amazing! Not only did I get the smile that I wanted and had compliments about it, but the whole experience was hassle-free. They dealt with my insurance and I was able to get a good payment plan for the out of pocket cost. The appointment availability/reminders were convenient too! Not to mention, the clinic is really clean and aesthetic, and the staff were very professional.

originalText.text: I was a patient with Dr Juson for almost three years. Dr Juson and the staff were extremely personable and always put me at ease. I’ve just completed my treatment and am delighted with my results. I would highly recommend Orthodontist & Co!

text.text: I was a patient with Dr Juson for almost three years. Dr Juson and the staff were extremely personable and always put me at ease. I’ve just completed my treatment and am delighted with my results. I would highly recommend Orthodontist & Co!

originalText.text: Dr. Juson and staff give the best and highest quality care. Their expertise and care for their patients achieve the perfect smile. I’ve previously had braces with a different orthodontist and I can say that my experience with The Orthodontist and Co. is by far, top notch. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I used to dread dental visits until I met Dr. Juson.  Dr. Juson and his team are simply remarkable.  They make me feel at ease and they are very patient in answering all my questions and concerns.  If you want nothing but excellent care then I highly recommend you see Dr. Juson.
